snippet.title: I Have 1 Day
snippet.description: I Have 1 Day You have one day to solve the mystery of your situation. You can turn back time when you go bad.

snippet.title: Only Seven Days
snippet.description: Only Seven Days Topview shooter. Get your tank ready and battle all enemy units earning cash for upgrades.

snippet.title: Shine Wars 2
snippet.description: Shine Wars 2 Physics puzzle game. Get the moon to start the night and the sun to start the day each of the stages.

snippet.title: A Day of Slacking
snippet.description: A Day of Slacking Here is something to keep you amused if you are at work.

snippet.title: Maxims Day Out
snippet.description: Maxims Day Out Try to catch as many frisbees as you can before the time expires.

snippet.title: 13 Days in Hell
snippet.description: 13 Days in Hell Are you the chosen one? Are you fit for this challenge? Can you survive thirteen days in hell?

snippet.title: Reincarnation: A Demon's Day Out
snippet.description: Reincarnation: A Demon's Day Out Point and click adventure game. You are send from hell to kill some people.

snippet.title: Bloody Fun Day
snippet.description: Bloody Fun Day Puzzle game. You play the reaper, you have to kill the cuties and collect their souls to stay alive.

snippet.title: Days 2 Die
snippet.description: Days 2 Die Place barricades, buy weapons and hire mercenaries to survive the zombie outbreak.

snippet.title: D-Day Defender
snippet.description: D-Day Defender Allied infantry troops are landing on the beach of Normandy. How long can you hold them off?
